sentences.sentence: It is not difficult to take up a new career in midlife.
sentences.translation: 人到中年开始新的事业并不难。

sentences.sentence: I went through my midlife crisis about four or five years ago, when I was forty.
sentences.translation: 在我40岁时，我经历了中年危机。

sentences.sentence: Karl Barth described midlife precisely this way.
sentences.translation: 卡尔·巴特正是这样描述中年生活的。
